Topic.Title: Rick Santelli great report on Housing

Message.Msg: I think he is a good guy but he is pressured by wrong people He needs to stop protecting wall street big boys and start thinking like average guy

Message.Title: Focus on Fiscal Cliff
Message.Msg: The focus on the cliff may be masking an underlying slide of international demand. The EU is papering over debt of countries that are heading towards recession. If taxes go up in the US while spending goes down it will slow down the US as well.

Message.Title: Monday Dec 3, 2012. Commentary/Analysis
Message.Msg: Currently my position is 100% Cash, On Monday, taking position with UVXY 200% short on the VIX. Stop Loss will be at $16.50 ----- Entry on Monday around $19.25 estimate. 15 minute time frame, serious buy signal was generated, looking for $50 plus around Dec 17 Have great weekend...

Topic.Title: If IBM Announce one time special divident!!!

Message.Msg: special dividends work against the stock price. Its like paying yourself from your share holdings as the price of the stock is ultimeately reduced by paying out this 'special' dividend. What you should wish for are small yearly incremental stock dividend increases. This has a calming effect on the stock price. Nothing to get excited about, yet overall an increased dividend.

Message.Title: $USD Cycle 1.6 years... 18 months
Message.Msg: Fiscal Cliff will produce stronger dollar. $92 Stronger dollar means lower stock markets...
